name: Pneumonic
description:
Spooky Walking Simulator where you need to Breathe to keep Exploring!

**CONTROLLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED**

Use RT or Space to match a red exertion circle to keep a steady flow of oxygen. 

This project was made for Scream Jam 2021. The breathing system was a mechanic I've wanted to play around with for a while, and a spooky game seemed like the perfect opportunity to try it out. The game ended up needing more work than expected to meet my full vision for it, so I decided to just make it a simple walking sim where you can enjoy a dark forest while playing around with the mechanic. I heavily relied on prebuilt assets, but the game put together entirely by myself. Enjoy!
